Episodes.Title: Cursed
Episodes.Plot: Cassie finds herself staring into a hell worse than she imagined when she discovers that the nephilium are stalking her, which can only mean one thing; her baby is alive.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Death Takes the Mother
Episodes.Plot: As a desperate Cassie tries to steal back her baby from Azazeal and perform her sacrifice, there's a cataclysmic twist in store...

Episodes.Title: Spiral
Episodes.Plot: Thelma must find Cassie's baby and deal with the wrath of Azazeal. But Medenham Hall is a bleak place for ethereal beings and mortals alike; she needs Ella's help.

Episodes.Title: Ella Burns
Episodes.Plot: Azazeal begins his torture of Ella, leaving Thelma to find out how he's doing it. Meanwhile, Roxanne's suspicions are growing...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: With a Little Help from My Friends (1)
Episodes.Plot: With Ella locked up in a mental hosipital, and growing worse by the hour, Thelma desperately tried to correct her harm. In her bid to save Ella, Thelma is forced to make contact with Leon.

Episodes.Title: With a Little Help from My Friends (2)
Episodes.Plot: As life takes a frightening turn for Ella, Thelma decides their only option is to tell Leon everything. Are his feelings for Ella strong enough or will he run a mile?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Noir
Episodes.Plot: Ella is set on exacting her revenge on Azazeal's accomplice Jez.  Then she meets Malachi and realises he is the one she's been waiting to kill all her life.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Where the Heart Is
Episodes.Plot: Ella can't resist Malachi's charm offer of a lifetime, travelling to 1920's Berlin, where depravatory and decedance reign supreme.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Doomed
Episodes.Plot: With Ella and Malachi in love the Powers That Be punish them, by giving Ella boils and making Malachi blind.  Also Thelma is besotted with Maya, however, she knows that Malachi can take her away from her anytime...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: You Lose
Episodes.Plot: Thelma wants to help Leon save Ella, but it will mean losing Maya.  Will she sacrifice the love of her life to rid the world of evil?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Hole
Episodes.Plot: Ella realises the enormity of her task. Killing Malachi won't be easy; he is feeding off Alex, so could she be the key? Or is it someone closer?

Episodes.Title: Seven Deadly Sins
Episodes.Plot: Most of the school bears the mark of Malachi. Can Leon stop the spread of evil and win back Ella's trust?

Episodes.Title: The Showdown
Episodes.Plot: It's Ella versus Malachi in the final showdown. But could Leon have what it takes to get tough, get killing and get the girl?
